text: kesidetenyochuna keredatochumi sīẖonu yemejemerīyawochu k’edamīwochi inezīyami bebego šira yeteketelwachewi ālahi ke’inesu wedwali ke’irisumi wedewali፡፡ beširochachewimi wenizochi yemīfesubachewini genetochi bewisit’achewi zele‘alemi newarīwochi sīẖonu le’inerisu āzegajitolachewali፡፡ yihi talak’i ‘idili newi፡፡
